name: Liberální institut
goal: The Liberální Institut is a libertarian think tank, promoting individual freedom, free markets, limited government, and peace. We focus on policy analyses, public seminars, and education.
interests: Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU trade negotiations, especially trade relations with the USA and Africa
EU competition policy, especially in regard to Google and Facebook
EU subsidies, especially in regard to the Czech Prime Minister
